# File: Thai_ThaiLogical.txt
# Generated from CLDR 
#
$thai = [[:thai:] ก-\u0E3Aเ-๛] ;
' '  ← $thai { '; '  } $thai;
← $thai { ' ' } $thai;
$thai_reversing = [[:Logical_Order_Exception:] & $thai];
$thai_non_reversing = [$thai - $thai_reversing ];
( $thai_reversing ) ( $thai_non_reversing ) → $2 $1;
$2 $1 ← ( $thai_non_reversing ) ( $thai_reversing ) ;
